section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:ClangFrontendAction
Creates ASTConsumer and returns ASTContext. A new ClangFrontendAction is created in the main, where the CompilerInstance and the SourceFiles are used to generate a new AST Tree Consumer Consumer
Customizes a Instance of ASTConsumer. The Consumer is used by the Frontend Action to traverse the AST Tree DataStorageMeasurementEvaluationStatementRuntimeVisitor
